heroes.name: Sleeping Dog
heroes.info: As soon as an enemy appears in range this unit will jump on it and destroy it

heroes.name: Assassin
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it

heroes.name: Eliminator
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it. Enemy is not injured but placed on discard pile

heroes.name: Sleeping beauty
heroes.info: Can only jump on unit if it can kill it.
